page.title: 06RECREATION AND LEISURE
page.content: {(CONTINUED FROM PREVIOUS PAGE) } At eighteen, with the legal age for drinking being reached,socializing in the public houses grows in popularity. With increasing age the numbers invovled in gardening also rises. The survey showed a wide variety of activities taking place especially in the older age groups where money was perhaps less of a restraint involvement in more expensive pursuits. Overall, outdoor sports, either as a spectator or participant, remained the most popular pastime for all ages. Lea Manor Recreation Centre provided the focus for many peoples activities. The number of school children that use the centre weekly is three thousand.
